error TS2351: This expression is not constructable.
  Type 'C' has no construct signatures.


!!! error TS2351: This expression is not constructable.
!!! error TS2351:   Type 'C' has no construct signatures.
==== newOnInstanceSymbol.ts (0 errors) ====
    class C {}
    var x = new C(); // should be ok
    new x(); // should error
